snippet: GLASSER--Gilda. Cherished and loving wife of Gerry. Adored mother of Joy, Judy and Bonnie. Grandmother and great-grand- mother to Leah, Reuben, Bennett, Grant, Cameron, Juliana and Allison. Words cannot express how much she will be missed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GLASSER--Gilda. Cherished and loving wife of Gerry. Adored mother of Joy, Judy and Bonnie. Grandmother and great-grand- mother to Leah, Reuben, Bennett, Grant, Cameron, Juliana and Allison. Words cannot express how much she will be missed. 1/3
